item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Everyone knows your location: tracking myself down through in-app ads (636 points | 215 comments)
2. Waydroid – Android in a Linux container (83 points | 12 comments)
3. The dumb reason why flag emojis aren't working on your site in Chrome on Windows (62 points | 25 comments)
4. ScatterBrain: Unmasking the shadow of PoisonPlug's obfuscator (40 points | 3 comments)
5. An open-source, extensible AI agent that goes beyond code suggestions (10 points | 4 comments)
6. Show HN: Lume – OS lightweight CLI for MacOS and Linux VMs on Apple Silicon (207 points | 60 comments)
7. Reverse-engineering and analysis of SanDisk High Endurance microSDXC card (2020) (211 points | 82 comments)
8. A loophole used by Shein/Temu to ship packages to US tax-free (43 points | 27 comments)
9. The Legacy of Lies in Alzheimer's Science (20 points | 5 comments)
10. Ask HN: What is interviewing like now with everyone using AI? (83 points | 97 comments)
11. Analyzing the codebase of Caffeine, a high performance caching library (179 points | 33 comments)
12. Why do War Thunder players leak classified information? [video] (49 points | 45 comments)
13. Repeat offenders may be responsible for many shark attacks (34 points | 23 comments)
14. Show HN: ESP32 RC Cars (242 points | 42 comments)
15. Show HN: Groundhog AI Spring API (42 points | 19 comments)
16. Spaced repetition can allow for infinite recall (2022) (119 points | 143 comments)
17. Life is more than an engineering problem (282 points | 165 comments)
18. Sniffnet – monitor your Internet traffic (160 points | 67 comments)
19. Macrodata Refinement (562 points | 296 comments)
20. UK betting giant's unlawful marketing kept suicidal gambler hooked (35 points | 22 comments)
21. The PETG adhesive test [video] (41 points | 19 comments)
22. RLHF Book (385 points | 30 comments)
23. AstroForge selects target for "high risk, seat of the pants" asteroid mission (90 points | 57 comments)
24. Fixing left and mutual recursions in grammars (92 points | 23 comments)
25. Inheritance and Subtyping (40 points | 37 comments)
26. Show HN: Modest – musical harmony library for Lua (53 points | 6 comments)
27. The Door Problem (2014) (21 points | 4 comments)
28. Recent results show that LLMs struggle with compositional tasks (303 points | 241 comments)
29. A Rust procedural language handler for PostgreSQL (102 points | 19 comments)
30. The doctor who gave himself an ulcer and solved a medical mystery (2010) (51 points | 45 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
